newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish police probe Dutroux's car-theft links.
newsitem.headline: Polish police probe Dutroux's car-theft links.

text.p: Polish police said on Friday they were investigating whether Belgian child rapist Marc Dutroux had visited their country.

"There is a Polish connection. But it is rather connected with car thefts and smuggling," Commissioner Andrzej Przemyski of the police press office told Reuters. "We are staying in touch with the Belgian police," he added.

He said so far there was no official evidence that Dutroux, a key suspect in the Belgian paedophile kidnapping, sex abuse and murder scandal, had visited Poland. Dutroux is also suspected of involvement in a car theft ring.
Poland has become a destination for many cars stolen in the West and is a transit country for those smuggled to Russia and other former Soviet countries.
